title: Fox Sports Sunday - October 18
text:
Sports » CBS 2 Local Sports » Fox Sports Sunday - October 18 CBS 2 Local Sports Fox Sports Sunday - October 18 
Updated: Mon, Oct 19 2015, 12:04 AM 
Sports Anchor Zach Hanley takes you around the world of sports on Fox Sports Sunday. Related Stories Ed Thomas Coach of the Week Faith, Family, Football. Words of Inspiration from the Coach Ed Thomas Foundation. CBS 2 and FOX 28 in partnership with the Eastern Iowa Airport are looking for coaches who embody the spirit of Coach Thomas by having a strong impact on the community and on the sidelines. Nominate your favorite coach from any sport in the form below. Your Name: Tell us about your nomination: Please re-enter the code shown in the image below. AP News Wires 
LAMAR ODOM - TRACING HIS STEPS 
LAS VEGAS (AP) -- He's been in a hospital since Tuesday, as doctors try to save his life. Business News 
Stocks seek direction 
NEW YORK (AP) -- Major U.S. stock indexes have been hovering between small gains and losses as investors assess the latest company earnings. Science/Tech News 
IN THE NEWS: DAILY FANTASY SPORTS SHUT DOWN BY NEVADA REGULATORS 
LAS VEGAS (AP) -- Nevada officials are ordering daily fantasy sports sites like DraftKings and FanDuel to shut down -- saying the sites can't operate without a gambling license.
